oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Gaston Hospital
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “John Gaston Hospital Memphis, Tenn.” Color image of exterior.

“Mrs. J. W. Everett -- 683 Freeman -- Memphis 12 -- Tenn. -- Thought you might like a -- card for a change. Hope -- the sun is as bright -- there as here. Nina is -- going to Mps. for her usual -- check-up by Dr. Carr. Says -- she will see you if she -- possibly can. The flu is -- not as bad here as over -- the rest of the state. -- Lots of love -- Mary”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: John Gaston Hospital; hospitals; medicine;
